extendedInfo.description: Become a fruit ninja to squish and squash colors to the fruit devil!Become a true coloring ninja warrior with every slash of squishy, splatty and satisfying juicier color to the fruit slice. Itâs a smash hit of sweet, tasty BEST fruit juicy game of colors. So, Swipe across the screen and rollâem up to feed fruit devil with best crazy colors. Be it an apple, orange, strawberry or any fruit roll; itâs juicier when itâs colorful. Squish things up with all the bright and attractive colors. Happy coloring!***How To Play***â Scroll down the images to select one of your choiceâ You can view it now on your coloring screen/coloring spaceâ Select a suitable colorâ Now color the image carefullyâ Save the image to your SD Card/Phone Memory or Image Gallery when you are done***Game Play Features***â Choose from 3 sizes of basic coloring tool brush for your kid painting art skillsâ¬â Use the free tool eraser to rub off the unwanted colorâ¬ from the pictureâ Let your child grow his creative instincts through this fun game with 20 multi color brushes from a range of colors and unique designs.â While your child play around with this coloring book, a nice music plays behind to boost up his thoughtsâ You have messed up and donât want to force the eraser all around? Press CLEAR ALL and the app do the cleaning job itself.â¬â We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger painting technique. Swipe across the screen where you want to color while the-machine-fills it for you. â Save the flashing sketch your fun brain kid has colored, to the SD card/Gallery I play this too! And I am sure your toddler will have fun coloring the delicious fruits. So install it on your device now and enjoy the interactive gameplay.***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Way too many adds!!!
reviews.comment: Whether my daughter is playing or not there\'s constantly adds on the screen,  Beware 3rd party adds..(singles in the area, and other junk) appear while your phone is turned off,  you hear the alert wondering is a text message, we\'ll is not, uninstall!
reviews.author: Zory Ortega
